 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד‎</span><sub>69</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Deut.17.6|Deut 17:6]]</sup> ==witness== (probably from ***reiterating***, hence ***emphatically affirming***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> absolute [[Gen.31.48|Gen 31:48]] +, construct [[Exod.20.16|Exod 20:16]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדִי‎</span> [[Job.16.19|Job 16:19]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדִים‎</span> [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדֵי‎</span> [[Ps.27.12|Ps 27:12]]; [[Ps.35.11|Ps 35:11]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדַי‎</span> [[Isa.43.10|Isa 43:10]]; [[Isa.43.12|Isa 43:12]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***witness, testimony, evidence***, of things: heap of stones [[Gen.31.44|Gen 31:44]]; [[Gen.31.48|Gen 31:48]]; [[Gen.31.52|Gen 31:52]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), torn animal [[Exod.22.12|Exod 22:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), song of Moses [[Deut.31.19|Deut 31:19]]; [[Deut.31.21|Deut 31:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), law-book v[[Deut.31.26|Deut 31:26]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), witness of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> against Israel; altar east of Jordan, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span>, [[Josh.22.27|Josh 22:27]]; [[Josh.22.28|Josh 22:28]]; [[Josh.22.34|Josh 22:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Isa.19.20|Isa 19:20]] Job's evil condition [[Job.16.8|Job 16:8]] the moon [[Ps.89.38|Ps 89:38]]. 

**2.** ***witness***, a person: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** God, in heaven for Job [[Job.16.19|Job 16:19]] on earth, for Samuel [[1Sam.12.5|1Sam 12:5]] (twice in verse) + v[[1Sam.12.6|1Sam 12:6]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] and most, Jeremiah [[Jer.42.5|Jer 42:5]] see also [[1Sam.20.12|1Sam 20:12]] (insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד‎</span> before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] Löhr [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); against persons [[Jer.29.23|Jer 29:23]]; [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]], nations [[Mic.1.2|Mic 1:2]] between (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span> persons [[Gen.31.50|Gen 31:50]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** Davidic dyn., to nations [[Isa.55.4|Isa 55:4]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***witnesses***, of transfer of property [[Jer.32.10|Jer 32:10]]; [[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]]; [[Jer.32.25|Jer 32:25]]; [[Jer.32.44|Jer 32:44]], betrothal [[Ruth.4.9|Ruth 4:9]]; [[Ruth.4.10|Ruth 4:10]]; [[Ruth.4.11|Ruth 4:11]] usually of testimony in court, and in civil and social relations, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> against, [[Num.5.13|Num 5:13]]; [[Josh.24.22|Josh 24:22]]; [[1Sam.12.5|1Sam 12:5]] +, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קום‎</span> ***rise up against*** [[Ps.27.12|Ps 27:12]]; [[Ps.35.11|Ps 35:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה עֵד שֶׁקֶר בְּ‎</span> ***answer*** (in court) ***as a false witness against*** [[Exod.20.16|Exod 20:16]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד שָׁוְא‎</span> [[Deut.5.17|Deut 5:17]]; [[Prov.25.18|Prov 25:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי עֵדִים‎</span> [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפִּֿי עֵדִ(יםׅ‎</span> [[Deut.17.6|Deut 17:6]] (twice in verse) ***at the mouth of witnesses***, so [[Deut.19.15|Deut 19:15]] (twice in verse). — ***False witness*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁקֶר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Exod.20.16|Exod 20:16]]; [[Deut.19.18|Deut 19:18]] (twice in verse); [[Ps.27.12|Ps 27:12]]; [[Prov.6.19|Prov 6:19]]; [[Prov.14.5|Prov 14:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁקָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.12.17|Prov 12:17]]; [[Prov.19.5|Prov 19:5]]; [[Prov.19.9|Prov 19:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּזָבִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.21.28|Prov 21:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִנָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.24.28|Prov 24:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלִיַּעַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.19.28|Prov 19:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָמָס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> ***witness of*** (i.e. supporting) ***violence*** [[Exod.23.1|Exod 23:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.19.16|Deut 19:16]]; [[Ps.35.11|Ps 35:11]]. ***Faithful witness*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱמוּנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.14.5|Prov 14:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱמֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Jer.42.5|Jer 42:5]]; [[Prov.14.25|Prov 14:25]]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָֽׂהֲדוּ‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==testimony== (√ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׂהַד‎</span> = [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְהַד‎</span> ***testify***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***testify***, compare Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׂהֵד‎</span>] (once, as loan-word) [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>Aramaic 86</sup>; Egyptian Aramaic plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שהדיאֹ‎</span> ***witnesses*** [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>404</sup> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>A. 15</sup> + often); — emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָֽׂהֲדוּתָא‎</span> [[Gen.31.47|Gen 31:47]] (\|\| Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד‎</span>).
